row.process: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_IS_SET_FROM_PROMPTS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_ENDPOINT :PUT_ATT conn_auth_method = "awsSignedURL" !Authen mode prompt :SET &AWS_SIGN_VERSION# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&CONN_AUTH_AWS_SIGN_VERSION#, 'V', '') :PUT_ATT conn_auth_aws_sign_version = &AWS_SIGN_VERSION# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_aws_accesskey = &CONN_AUTH_AWS_ACCESSKEY# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_aws_secret_accesskey = &CONN_AUTH_AWS_SECRET_ACCESSKEY# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_PROXY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_ADVANCE
